UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile, storing their name and avatar.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

avatar.description: The user's chosen avatar (e.g., an emoji or image URL).

avatarType.description: The type of avatar used by the user.

unlockedAnimalIds.description: A list of IDs of spirit animals the user has unlocked.

Emotion.title: Emotion
Emotion.description: Represents an emotion that a user can track in their diary.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Emotion entity.

userProfileId.description: ID of the user who owns this emotion.

icon.description: An icon (e.g., an emoji) representing the emotion.

color.description: A color associated with the emotion, for visual representation.

description.description: A description of the emotion and what it means to the user.

isCustom.description: Flag to indicate if the emotion is user-defined.

DiaryEntry.title: DiaryEntry
DiaryEntry.description: Represents a single diary entry, recording a user's emotion and experience on a specific date.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DiaryEntry entity.

userProfileId.description: ID of the user who owns this diary entry.

date.description: The date of the diary entry.

text.description: A textual description of the user's experience.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Accessible only to the user with matching UID.

/users/{userId}/emotions/{emotionId}.description: Stores user-defined emotions. Accessible only to the user with matching UID.

/users/{userId}/diaryEntries/{diaryEntry.description: Stores diary entries for each user. Accessible only to the user with matching UID.
